content: this pattern uses worsted weight yarn to make an 11″ lamb from cult of the lamb i used whatever yarn i had on hand so i think a softer white yarn would show fewer holes but when the lamb commands it… this pattern is not overly complex but does have a lot of parts please enjoy and send us a picture on twitter @tuxexplorer 1 if you make one 1 https //twitter com/tuxexplorer
